statements: SELECT dataset_id, source_id, data_point, data_value FROM dataset_join_analysis;
SELECT dataset_id, data_point, data_value, source_id FROM dataset_join_analysis;
SELECT data_point, dataset_id, data_value, source_id FROM dataset_join_analysis;
SELECT data_value, source_id, dataset_id, data_point FROM dataset_join_analysis;
SELECT source_id, dataset_id, data_value, data_point FROM dataset_join_analysis;
SELECT data_point, data_value FROM dataset_join_analysis WHERE dataset_id = 1 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT dataset_id, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM dataset_join_analysis GROUP BY dataset_id HAVING AVG(data_value) > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT source_id FROM dataset_join_analysis WHERE data_value BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT dataset_id, SUM(data_value) as total_value FROM dataset_join_analysis GROUP BY dataset_id ORDER BY dataset_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT dataset_id, AVG(data_value) as average_value, MAX(data_value) as max_value FROM dataset_join_analysis GROUP BY dataset_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT id, name, data_value1 FROM datasets_from_source_A;
SELECT name, data_value1, id FROM datasets_from_source_A;
SELECT * FROM datasets_from_source_A WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data_value1, name FROM datasets_from_source_A WHERE name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT attribute, data_value2, source_id FROM datasets_from_source_B;
SELECT id, name, data_value1 FROM datasets_from_source_A WHERE id = 5;
SELECT name, data_value1, id FROM datasets_from_source_A WHERE name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT data_value1, id, name FROM datasets_from_source_A WHERE data_value1 > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, data_value1, id FROM datasets_from_source_A ORDER BY data_value1 ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM datasets_from_source_B WHERE data_value2 <= 50;
SELECT * FROM dataset1 WHERE column1 = 1
SELECT column2, column3 FROM dataset1 WHERE column1 = 2
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM dataset1 WHERE column2 = 'value'
SELECT column3, column1, column2 FROM dataset1
SELECT column1, column3 FROM dataset1 WHERE column2 = 'another value'
SELECT * FROM dataset1 WHERE column1 > 100 ORDER BY column2 DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT column2, column3 FROM dataset1 WHERE column1 BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY column3 ASC
SELECT column1, column2 FROM dataset1 WHERE column3 < '2022-01-01'
SELECT column2 FROM dataset1 WHERE column1 = 50 AND column3 > '2022-01-01'
SELECT column1, column2 FROM dataset1 WHERE column1 % 2 = 0 ORDER BY column1 ASC
SELECT * FROM dataset_1;
SELECT id, name, age FROM dataset_2 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, income FROM dataset_3 WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT name, address FROM combined_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT occupation, source_3_data FROM dataset_3 ORDER BY occupation ASC;
SELECT * FROM dataset_1 ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, occupation, income FROM combined_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT name, age, income FROM dataset_1 JOIN dataset_3 ON dataset_1.id = dataset_3.id WHERE occupation = 'Engineer'
SELECT DISTINCT occupation FROM dataset_3 WHERE income > 50000
SELECT * FROM combined_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 2;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers;
